vendor_name: Hotel Hospes Palacio de Arenales & Spa
title: Boutique Palace Luxury in the Heart of World Heritage Spanish City
description: Centuries-old olive trees and wide, flat green spaces await in the UNESCO World Heritage city of Caceres when you stay at Hospes Palacio de Arenales & Spa - Cáceres. Expect to find ancient Roman relics, widely celebrated gastronomy and breathtaking nature at every turn. A must-try during your stay is Las Corchuelas Restaurant, an icon in Caceres. Feast on local flavours cooked in innovative ways. Meanwhile, Bodyna Spa is the perfect place to unwind with a treatment.
